Experiment_description: The experiments across different nodes explore sequence classification methods for the SPR task. Node 184ca956cf3d4cc99cfeda5a990d5550 uses a neural-symbolic baseline approach, while Nodes 9b9e6880e5b44a73a095908a86e968e4 and 57c4bfbf5b304cb99f20fca8220539e1 employ a GRU-based model.
Significance: These experiments are crucial in understanding the effectiveness of different sequence classification approaches for the SPR task. They reveal insights into model performance and generalization, highlighting areas like overfitting and the ability to handle unseen rule signatures, which are critical for developing robust models.
Description: Node 184ca956cf3d4cc99cfeda5a990d5550 uses a neural-symbolic model that embeds discrete symbols and averages them for classification. Nodes 9b9e6880e5b44a73a095908a86e968e4 and 57c4bfbf5b304cb99f20fca8220539e1 utilize GRU models, processing embedded symbols through a GRU and predicting labels with a linear layer. All nodes evaluate using metrics such as accuracy, shape-weighted accuracy, color-weighted accuracy, and NRGS.

List_of_included_plots.description: The training and validation loss both decrease steadily over the epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: This plot indicates effective learning with a slight risk of overfitting, as the training loss decreases more rapidly than validation loss.

List_of_included_plots.description: Bar chart presenting test metrics for the SPR_BENCH dataset.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The chart shows high accuracy and NRGS, indicating strong generalization capabilities, but suggests slight inefficiencies in handling shape and color diversity.

Key_numerical_results.analysis: This accuracy shows moderate performance, demonstrating the potential and limitations of the neural-symbolic baseline.
This high accuracy reflects the GRU model's strong ability to learn from the training data, outperforming the neural-symbolic baseline.
The perfect NRGS score suggests that the model generalizes well to novel rules within the validation set.
This high NRGS indicates excellent generalization to novel rules, emphasizing the model's robustness in handling unseen scenarios.
